body:
I guess the issue is with 

dest.cells = selectedcell

You are trying to pass 1 Cell object to a variable containing (i suppose, from the plural) an array of Cell-s.

  • If you just want to pass 1 cell just correct the destination type to Cell.

  • If you want to pass an array of cells then you need to tell us with which policy

  • If you want to instantiate in the destination view controller as many new cells as the number defined by the selected cell.number then pass the cell as you are doing and in the destination view controller implement the needed uitableviewdelegate/datasource and instantiate them.

[Should be a comment but is too long]
title: TableView, Array and segue
